sub_title: Sustainable development | Social impact | Social innovation & Governance | Responsible Business | Consultancy | Project management
summary:
Hello and welcome to my LinkedIn profile! 

I am a Master in Sustainable Business and Innovation at Utrecht University in The Netherlands, where I am pursuing my passion for promoting sustainability in business. I am dedicated to contributing to a more sustainable future through the incorporation of social and environmental friendly aspects in business.

I developed my skills in teamwork, leadership, oral and written communication, empathy, analytical thinking, and problem-solving. I have a keen ability to adapt to diverse environments and a strong desire to continue learning.

My academic background spans five countries, including Colombia, Argentina, Canada, France, and the Netherlands, which has allowed me to interact with foreign cultures and enrich my knowledge through travel and exposure to different perspectives. I believe that this global perspective enhances my ability to approach sustainable development challenges in a creative and innovative manner.

I am committed to making a positive impact and creating a better world through my work. Thank you for visiting my profile, and please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or would like to connect.
